meanings.definition: A room where coats are stored.
meanings.sent1: The coatrooms at the party were filled with colorful jackets.
meanings.sent2: Please hang your coat in the coatrooms before entering the theater.
meanings.sent3: The coatrooms looked like a rainbow with all the different coats hanging.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of coats, the coatrooms resembled a forest of fabric.
meanings.sent5: The coatrooms smelled of damp wool and fresh laundry.

meanings.definition: The act of storing coats in a designated area.
meanings.sent1: After the event, the coatrooms were a mess with coats thrown everywhere.
meanings.sent2: Proper coatrooms organization can make finding your coat much easier.
meanings.sent3: The coatrooms seemed to have a mind of their own, rearranging coats when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The coatrooms were a black hole for coats, swallowing them up and never giving them back.
meanings.sent5: Coatrooms are like guardians, keeping your coat safe until you return.
